about_the_game:
Overview:
Invasion: Phoenix is a passion project by a solo developer and lifelong gamer eager to bring back the glory days of video gaming! An alien empire hellbent on conquering Earth has arrived at our doorstep, and humanity is in total anarchy. Delve into this meticulously crafted 2D top-down pixel art RTS and sign up with the Earthen Union to take back Earth from the clutches of the Zyrex Empire. Or, will you instead join the Empire and fight to crush humanity under your boots? The choice is yours.

With custom matches available now, and a roadmap promising expansive campaigns and thrilling updates, Invasion: Phoenix vows to revitalize the RTS genre wish a dash of sci-fi magic. Earth hangs in the balance; can you save it, or will you enslave it?



Key Features:
  • Singular Vision, Limitless Ambition: Witness the culmination of a lifetime of passion and unwavering commitment as a new universe is brought to life, teeming with intrigue and possibility. Return to the glory days of gaming and get lost in the experience.
  • Expansive Campaigns on the Horizon: Anticipate the unveiling of single player campaigns for the Earthen Union rebels and the authoritarian Zyrex Empire. Destroy your enemies and claim Earth as your own across a variety of missions and environments, each brimming with challenges and triumphs.
  • A Diverse Arsenal at Your Command: Assume control of a formidable array of units inspired by the vast expanse of science fiction, ranging from conventional Earth military hardware, to the awe-inspiring Zyrex Empire, to the cutting-edge technology of the Coalition of Life.
  • Devastating Combat Powers: Harness the might of devastating combat powers unique to each faction, from precision airstrikes and tactical mercenary deployments, to the terrifying fury of orbital lasers. Seize control of the battlefield with strategic finesse and unleash chaos upon your adversaries.
  • Dynamic Gameplay Environments: Immerse yourself in eight distinct custom match game modes, encompassing timeless classics like Capture the Flag and deathmatch, alongside innovative additions such as Terror mode. Tailor your experience to your preferences with toggle options, ensuring endless variety and replayability.
  • An Endless Ocean of Lore: Immerse yourself in a galaxy steeped in history and mystery, supported by an extensive collection of codex entries that peel back the layers of Invasion: Phoenix's enigmatic narrative. Prepare yourself for a journey of discovery that transcends the confines of the game itself, and opens the door to a compelling new universe.
  • An Original Soundtrack to Enrich Your Experience: Immerse yourself in the captivating melodies and atmospheric soundscapes of Invasion: Phoenix, crafted with care and attention to detail by the developer themselves. Let the music transport you to the heart of the conflict and elevate your gaming experience to new heights.
  • Early Access: Embrace the opportunity to shape the destiny of Invasion: Phoenix in its early access phase. Engage in custom matches today, and stand at the ready for the release of updates and campaign mode that promise to expand the game's horizons, and revitalize the RTS genre.



Forge Your Destiny:
Are you prepared to heed the call and carve your name into galactic legend? Embrace the challenge, seize the opportunity, and embark on a journey that will test your mettle and redefine your perceptions of gaming!

content_descriptors.notes:
- Cartoonish, yet still realistic, depictions of the killing of humans and aliens.
- Mature, gritty, somewhat dark themes about apocalyptic life amidst a hostile alien occupation.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later (32 or 64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics card w/ DirectX 11 support or equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX-compatible stereo sound card w/ basic audio playback
